name: Honor
description: This work is composed of letters of filial piety and brotherly love on Korean white porcelain, which symbolizes the nobility and humility of Joseon, a Confucian society. The Letter Painting of Filial Piety and Brotherly Love uses eight letters that mean filial duty, brotherly love, loyalty, faith, manners, honor, integrity, conscience to express the ethics. This work is still cut of motion artwork means ‘honor’. Hope you enjoy it,
